name: Your Next Store
tagline: Launch your store in minutes. Stripe-native. Built for AI.
description: Your Next Store is for founders, brand owners and agencies who want to launch and run a modern, high-performance online store without the plugin bloat and limitations of platforms like Shopify. For those who value speed and adaptability.

name: RizzCalc
tagline: The 1st AI Financial Modeling Agent in Google Sheets
description: RizzCalc is the first AI financial modeling add-on for Google Sheets, enabling users to build and edit models effortlessly using natural language. The name RizzCalc pays tribute to VisiCalc, the first spreadsheet built in 1979, which changed the world.

name: Munch Studio
tagline: The AI Marketing Partner for SMBs
description: Munch Studio is an AI platform that manages the full social media presence for small businesses, making it simple to grow online while saving time, money, and effort.

name: GPT-5 Codex
tagline: A version of GPT-5 better at agentic coding
description: Codex just got faster, more reliable, and better at real-time collaboration and tackling tasks independently anywhere you develop—whether via the terminal, IDE, web, or even your phone.

name: HeyHelp
tagline: Gmail with a brain
description: Save 1 hour a day by making Gmail work for you. HeyHelp is an AI assistant that auto-sorts emails, highlights priorities, drafts replies in your voice, blocks cold pitches, and learns your patterns. Works with OpenAI, Google, and Anthropic.

name: Bazaar V3
tagline: Vibe-code your software demo video
description: Bazaar turns screenshots of your app into motion graphic videos using prompts.

name: Endform
tagline: Playwright end-to-end tests in seconds
description: Introducing Endform, the fastest Playwright test runner available. Run tests fully in parallel to get results in seconds. Stay on top of your failures and flaky tests. Endform lets you spend less time waiting for re-runs, and more time shipping code.

name: Crates
tagline: A better home for your music collection
description: With Crates you can import from Spotify, Discogs, Bandcamp, YouTube and more, organize files with artwork and metadata, sync mobile and discover exciting new music through user shared Gems, not algorithms. Own your data and enjoy your music collection forever!

name: Hostinger Horizons with eCommerce
tagline: Launch your store with AI. 100+ global payment methods.
description: Create your online store with a built-in eCommerce integration, and edit your website just by chatting with AI. Easily manage products, orders, payments and more. When you’re ready, launch your online shop in one click.

name: Kan.bn
tagline: The open source alternative to Trello for teams and makers
description: Kan.bn brings back Trello’s simplicity in open source. Self-host, or hosted by us. Make organising work effortless.

name: CheckinBee
tagline: Daily text check-ins for loved ones living alone
description: Peace of mind made simple: CheckinBee sends a daily text to older adults living alone. If they don’t respond, family or friends are notified right away. Independence for them, reassurance for you. Free 14-day trial.

name: Model Kombat by HackerRank
tagline: The AI Code Arena
description: Coding LLMs go head-to-head on real programming tasks. Developers vote on which solution they'd actually ship. These votes become training data for better models. No synthetic tests. Just code, performance, and brutal honesty.

name: CanaryPDF
tagline: Extract tables and edit PDF files right in your browser
description: A free, all-in-one PDF toolkit. Extract tables and images, edit and reorganize pages (delete, rotate, reorder) and merge PDF files. Secure, private and works entirely in your browser. No uploads required.

name: Auron
tagline: Your Desktop. Now with a Brain.
description: Auron AI turns your computer into a smart companion that helps you manage tasks, automate actions, and communicate naturally. Sign up for early access today. It doesn’t just work for you — it works with you.

name: Mureka Agent Studio
tagline: From a simple idea to a full song
description: Mureka Agent Studio is a new feature that makes music creation accessible to everyone. Just describe an idea, a mood, or even a meme, and the agents handle everything from lyrics to composition, turning your thoughts into complete songs in seconds.

name: Haystack
tagline: Review pull requests like you wrote them yourself
description: Haystack is the fastest path from pull request to merge. It makes PRs read like a story: changes unfold in order, data flows are traced end-to-end, and caller contexts are surfaced. Even complex code feels simple to review in Haystack!

name: icpay
tagline: Stripe, for crypto.
description: Accept crypto payments globally with sub-2 second settlements, 0.5% fees and fully programmable transactions. icpay is a faster, cheaper, borderless alternative to Stripe – powered by the Internet Computer.

name: Cognitora
tagline: AI Agent Compute Platform
description: Cognitora is the cloud platform built for executing AI-generated code. Unlike traditional container platforms, Cognitora leverages high-performance microVMs using Cloud Hypervisor and Firecracker to deliver secure, lightweight AI-native compute environments.

name: ChatWithAnyone
tagline: On-device AI. Private. Fast. Built for iPhones wih iOS 26.
description: ChatWithAnyone is an iOS 26-exclusive app powered by Apple’s on-device LLM. 100% on-device, private, and fast—featuring specialized AI personas for chat, language learning, role-play, and writing assistance.

name: TrackFit
tagline: Progress your fitness goals using machine learning
description: The Personal Fitness Tracker! This Streamlit-based web application allows users to predict the calories burned during exercise. The app leverages machine learning models to provide accurate predictions and helps users track their fitness journey over time.

name: Your Next Store
tagline: Launch your store in minutes. Stripe-native. Built for AI.
description: Your Next Store is for founders, brand owners and agencies who want to launch and run a modern, high-performance online store without the plugin bloat and limitations of platforms like Shopify. For those who value speed and adaptability.
